sheet.name: en
sheet.text: These ruins are almost like a puzzle.
I know, right? I don't even know what I'm doing with most of these. I'm just running on instinct.
Well, the energy that powers them is linked to Cyber Space, right? And you took on that power when you freed me. Maybe that link is giving you special insight?
Maybe they used that link among themselves. Like, instead of a language, they shared their thoughts and feelings directly!
Maybe. All I know is the idea of the map gets updated in my head, which brings me one step closer to rescuing you!
